data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: Coordinative Intercalation of Alkylamines into Layered Zinc Phenylphosphonate. Crystal Structures from X-ray Powder Diffraction Data

data.question: Who are the authors of the article?
data.answer: Damodara M. Poojary and Abraham Clearfield

data.question: In which journal was the article published?
data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society
